text:
There is a purpose why the LBD is a wardrobe staple: You possibly can put on it anyplace—award ceremonies included.

Working example: the inaugural 2017 Revolve Awards.

Celebrities, influencers and trend obsessives got here collectively Thursday night time to honor the most important trendsetters within the digital panorama. Whereas the purple carpet arrivals offered loads of #outfitinspo, there was one outstanding development that basically stole the night time: LBDs.

Earlier than you assume we’re speaking concerning the basic iteration (assume: Breakfast at Tiffany’s), that is the Revolve we’re speaking about, which suggests each physique-hugging, black mini had a bit of one thing additional about it.
